summary: Adds a ship by the name of Kronan ( The crown in swedish) to the port in solitude.
descriptionHtml:
[size=4][u]DISCONTINUED[/u]
[/size]
Back in early 2013 life took a giant shit on me, And to make it a little bit worse my hardrive was damaged so I lost a substantial update I was about to release. After that debacle I just lost the will to pick up the slack and start over again so I've decided allow my mod to be used in others instead.



What it does? you get your own ship called kronan with a custom made interior of Katariah architecture so its not a copy and paste job. This mod is Beta stage right now, I only wanted to show you what i have done so far. The ship is located near the port of Solitude

I still need to create: done with cluttering and navmeshing, im still a noob when i comes to AI packages and optimization, this mod will likely be finished early next year.
author: VGC
